full_text.0: The Utah AG has joined a coalition of 45 attorneys general urging the DEA and Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration to permanently extend telehealth flexibilities for prescribing buprenorphine, an opioid use disorder treatment. https://t.co/ePCCAFrSRo
full_text.1: AG Reyes announced today that a settlement has been reached with Walmart to address the company’s role in the opioid crisis. Once approved, it will provide more than $3 billion nationally and require significant improvements in how Walmart handles opioids. https://t.co/775rARQ6ef
full_text.2: News release: Wasden Announces $3.1 Billion Settlement with Walmart over Opioid Epidemic Allegations https://t.co/YYtHRn0Rnf
